title: Awakening Your Spirit Guide: 27- Minute Guided Meditation | davidji
description:
Hello Spiritual Warrior,
 
Let’s dive deep with this meditation. It’s the perfect time of year to both reflect and look ahead…so let’s do that through the lens of inviting our spirit guide to join us in this journey of our life. Make sure to feather your nest and settle in for a beautiful guided meditative journey.
 
I’ll invite you to find a trait, or a universal characteristic within you that you’d like to be able to call on. Something that is already there, yet sitting dormant within you. 

✨AND BEFORE YOU GO, PLEASE LIKE, COMMENT & SUBSCRIBE 🙏

channelDescription:
Welcome to my YouTube channel!!! I'm davidji, a stress-management expert, author and meditation teacher. Make sure to subscribe to my channel if you'd like to get notified when I post meditations, and tips & tricks on how to be mindfull, rather than mindless. 

There are many paths to one-ness. Literally, thousands of schools and philosophies of meditation exist, each with a unique technique or way of helping to experience present-moment awareness. I celebrate them all!! Togther, let's dive deep. Let's explore the world of meditation, and learn how to become our best self.

Peace. - davidji

https://www.davidji.com
